mapper.sql: id , group_no, uid, franchisee_id, tenant_id, del_flag, create_time, update_time, operator
mapper.insert:
insert into t_user_info_group_detail(group_no, uid, franchisee_id, tenant_id, create_time, update_time, operator) values
(#{item.groupNo},#{item.uid},#{item.franchiseeId}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.operator})
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_user_info_group_detail tuigd left join t_user_info_group tuig on tuig.group_no = tuigd.group_no where tuig.id = #{id}

select tuigd.uid as uid, tuigd.group_no as groupNo, tuig.id as groupId, tuig.name as groupName from t_user_info_group_detail tuigd left join t_user_info_group tuig on tuigd.group_no = tuig.group_no
tuig.del_flag = 0
and tuigd.uid in
#{uid}
order by tuigd.update_time desc
